sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.MatchingDimensionFilterProcessor</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>MatchingDimensionFilterProcessor</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var MatchingDimensionFilterProcessor = Class.create();
MatchingDimensionFilterProcessor.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    
	},
	getFilterData:function(filterParam){
		var filterData = [];
		if(filterParam && filterParam.criteria_sys_id){
			var gr = new GlideRecord('matching_dimension');
			gr.get(filterParam.criteria_sys_id);
				gs.log("Vinay dimension found",gr.getValue('use_reference'));
				if(gr.getValue('use_reference')){
					var filterTable = gr.getValue("reference_table");
					var filterCond = gr.getValue("reference_filter");
					var filterFieldName = gr.getValue("reference_field");
					var filterGR = new GlideRecordSecure(filterTable);
					filterGR.addQuery(filterCond);
					filterGR.query();
					while(filterGR.next()){
						var filterDataObj = {};
						filterDataObj.id = filterGR.getValue('sys_id');
						filterDataObj.text = filterGR.getDisplayValue(filterFieldName);
						filterData.push(filterDataObj);
					}
				}	
		}
		return filterData;	
	},
    type: 'MatchingDimensionFilterProcessor'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2017-04-07 21:40:40</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>321f9764c3467200948710c422d3aef7</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>MatchingDimensionFilterProcessor</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Resource Matching Engine" source="com.snc.matching_rule">55d6f9412f140110d8a4d5f62799b646</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_321f9764c3467200948710c422d3aef7</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2017-04-07 22:26:25</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>1042</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
